languages.text: "Мой милый Кор, перед тем, как жевать фузелин с чегнарями, надо сметнуть алтарь и спрятать пульсы. Если Владайм сыграет на всех линиях, меня он не тронет, но я не хочу подвергать риску вас. Ходит треск о Комиссии..." {n}Разговор превращается в мешанину терминов из секретного наречия хладных торговцев.{/n}

"Kor, my sweet, before you go chewing fyceline with chegnars, you need to clear the altar and hide the pulses. If Vladaym's playing all the lines, he won't touch me, but I don't want to shift the risk onto you. There's chatter about the Commission..." {n}The conversation quickly turns into an impenetrable mishmash of terms from the secret argot of Cold Traders.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мой милый Кор, перед тем, как жевать фузелин с чегнарями, надо сметнуть алтарь и спрятать пульсы. Если Владайм сыграет на всех линиях, меня он не тронет, но я не хочу подвергать риску вас. Ходит треск о Комиссии..." {n}Разговор превращается в мешанину терминов из секретного наречия хладных торговцев.{/n}

languages.text: “科尔，亲爱的，动别人山头之前，得先把碍事的点子都清理掉，把盘子都捋顺了。只要弗拉迪姆打算稳中求进，他肯定是不会打我的主意，但我也不打算把所有风险都让你一个人背。我还听说，最近风头挺紧……”{n}接下来的谈话，掺杂着冷市贸易这行各种各样的行话和黑话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Kor, my sweet, before you go chewing fyceline with chegnars, you need to clear the altar and hide the pulses. If Vladaym's playing all the lines, he won't touch me, but I don't want to shift the risk onto you. There's chatter about the Commission..." {n}The conversation quickly turns into an impenetrable mishmash of terms from the secret argot of Cold Traders.{/n}

languages.text: 「コー、愛しい人よ、シェグナーでファイセリン燃料を噛む前に、祭壇を片付けてパルスを隠す必要がある。ヴラダイムが全力を尽くしているのなら、あたしに手を出すことはないだろう。でも、アンタに危険は負わせたくないんだ。委員会の話があるんだけど…」{n}会話はたちまち、コールド・トレーダーたちの隠語の寄せ集めのような不可解なものに変わる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Kor, my sweet, before you go chewing fyceline with chegnars, you need to clear the altar and hide the pulses. If Vladaym's playing all the lines, he won't touch me, but I don't want to shift the risk onto you. There's chatter about the Commission..." {n}The conversation quickly turns into an impenetrable mishmash of terms from the secret argot of Cold Traders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「コー、愛しい人よ、シェグナーでファイセリン燃料を噛む前に、祭壇を片付けてパルスを隠す必要がある。ヴラダイムが全力を尽くしているのなら、あたしに手を出すことはないだろう。でも、アンタに危険は負わせたくないんだ。委員会の話があるんだけど…」{n}会話はたちまち、コールド・トレーダーたちの隠語の寄せ集めのような不可解なものに変わる。{/n}

languages.text: «Kor, cielo, antes de que te pongas a masticar fycelina con chegnars, limpia el altar y oculta los pulsos. Si Vladaym le está dando a todos los palos no me tocará, pero no quiero que corras el riesgo. Corren rumores sobre la Comisión...». {n}La conversación pronto se convierte en un galimatías incomprensible de términos de la jerga secreta del Comercio Frío.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Kor, my sweet, before you go chewing fyceline with chegnars, you need to clear the altar and hide the pulses. If Vladaym's playing all the lines, he won't touch me, but I don't want to shift the risk onto you. There's chatter about the Commission..." {n}The conversation quickly turns into an impenetrable mishmash of terms from the secret argot of Cold Traders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Kor, cielo, antes de que te pongas a masticar fycelina con chegnars, limpia el altar y oculta los pulsos. Si Vladaym le está dando a todos los palos no me tocará, pero no quiero que corras el riesgo. Corren rumores sobre la Comisión...». {n}La conversación pronto se convierte en un galimatías incomprensible de términos de la jerga secreta del Comercio Frío.{/n}

languages.text: « Kor, mon chou, avant d'aller jouer avec de la fyceline au milieu des chegnars, il faut déjà dégager l'autel et cacher les impulsions. Si Vladaym joue sur tous les fronts, il ne me touchera pas, mais je ne veux pas que le risque retombe sur vous. On parle beaucoup de la commission... » {n}La conversation se transforme bien vite en un amalgame complexe de termes incompréhensibles qui forment l'argot secret des contrebandiers du Commerce Froid.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Kor, my sweet, before you go chewing fyceline with chegnars, you need to clear the altar and hide the pulses. If Vladaym's playing all the lines, he won't touch me, but I don't want to shift the risk onto you. There's chatter about the Commission..." {n}The conversation quickly turns into an impenetrable mishmash of terms from the secret argot of Cold Traders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Kor, mon chou, avant d'aller jouer avec de la fyceline au milieu des chegnars, il faut déjà dégager l'autel et cacher les impulsions. Si Vladaym joue sur tous les fronts, il ne me touchera pas, mais je ne veux pas que le risque retombe sur vous. On parle beaucoup de la commission... » {n}La conversation se transforme bien vite en un amalgame complexe de termes incompréhensibles qui forment l'argot secret des contrebandiers du Commerce Froid.{/n}

languages.text: "Kor, mein Süßer, bevor Ihr mit Chegnar Fycelin kauen geht, müsst Ihr den Altar freimachen und die Entladungen verstecken. Wenn Vladaym alle Züge spielt, wird er mir nichts tun, aber ich will nicht, dass Ihr einem Risiko ausgesetzt werdet. Es gibt Gerede über den Auftrag ..." {n}Das Gespräch geht schnell über in ein undurchschaubares Potpourri von Geheimwörtern, die der Diebessprache der Kalthändler entspringen.{/n}

languages.text: "Tatlım Kor, çegnarlarla fiselin kemirmeye gitmeden önce sunağı temizlemen ve nabız atışlarını gizlemen gerek. Vladaym herkese oynuyorsa bana dokunamaz ama ilgisini size kaydırsın istemiyorum. Komisyon hakkında söylentiler var..." {n}Sohbet; hızla Soğuk Tacirlerin kendilerine ait gizli jargonundan tabirlerle dolu, müdahil olunamaz bir karmaşaya evriliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Kor, my sweet, before you go chewing fyceline with chegnars, you need to clear the altar and hide the pulses. If Vladaym's playing all the lines, he won't touch me, but I don't want to shift the risk onto you. There's chatter about the Commission..." {n}The conversation quickly turns into an impenetrable mishmash of terms from the secret argot of Cold Traders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kor, tatlım, çegnarlarla fiselin kemirmeye gitmeden önce sunağı temizlemen ve nabız atışlarını gizlemen gerek. Vladaym tüm cephelere oynuyorsa bana dokunamaz ama ilgisini size kaydırsın istemiyorum. Komisyon hakkında söylentiler var..." {n}Sohbet hızlı bir şekilde, Soğuk Tacirlerin kendilerine ait gizli jargonundan tabirlerle dolu, müdâhil olunamaz bir karmaşaya evriliyor.{/n}
